# Overview

Welcome to this GitHub repository which hosts **dtsmTMB** [(Discrete Time Stochastic Modelling using Template Model Builder)](https://phillipbvetter.github.io/ctsmTMB/index.html). The purpose of the package is to facilitate a user-friendly tool for (state and parameter) inference, and forecasting, in (multi-dimensional) discrete-discrete stochastic state space systems, i.e. systems on the form

$$
X_{t+1} = A_t X_{t} + B_t U_t + W_t
$$
$$
Y_t = C_t X_t 
$$
